Posts.Content: Hi I have just been diagnosed with breast cancer and am now on letrazole. Can I still have my hair coloured (I have lots of grey hair otherwise )
Posts.Title: Letrozole and hair color

Posts.Content: Thank you, only been diagnosed for 3 weeks and heard so many horror stories that I decided to try you guys, so glad I did.
Posts.Title: Letrozole and hair color

Posts.Content: Hi everyone, very new to this cancer thing, does anyone recommend a travel insurance that is not really expensive, my son is taking me To Australia to see my family, but I can’t find reasonable cover. Any ideas please.
Posts.Title: Travel Insurance.

Posts.Content: My family live there,so it’s back to Adelaide for me, a pick me up presie from my son, I have the miseries at the moment,feeling sorry for little me   Thank you for info.
Posts.Title: Travel Insurance.
